ArrayOfString.string: {nameSimple} joins the game! ({count})
{nameSimple} leaves the game. ({count})
Who wants to play {mode}? You have {seconds} seconds. /join - join the game
{seconds} seconds remaining. Still have a chance to play! /join - join the game
Recruiting of players is over. We have {count} players. Good luck!
Not enough players ({count}/{minCount})
Charges: {count}
Cooldown: {current}/{total}
Remaining Players: {players}
OK.
Your vote has been canceled.

You skipped the turn.

{nameSimple} skipped the turn.
{nameSimple} - you can not vote for yourself!
{nameSimple} votes for {toHang} ({count}).
{nameSimple} is sure of {toHang}'s guilt ({count}).

{nameSimple} votes for the murder of {toKill} ({count})!
â” It's Nig... Where are you? Rabble-rouser talks, you listen? OK, let's skip this night.
Some players were inactive more than {limit} days and removed from game: {players}.
{name}'s (`{nameSimple}'s`) status â€” {role}.
You have been killed...
The shop is disabled in this game mode.
You are a typical representative of the innocent population of the city. Your task is to sleep at night, and in the afternoon try to find the mafia and convict them.

It is you who are the main hope of all innocent civilians for a peaceful life. Your task is to shoot all the mafia. Remember: You work undercover. If the mafia find you, they will kill at the first opportunity! Every night you can check the status of any player. If he belongs to mafia, he will be killed.

At night you can seduce anyone (but not 2 times in a row). This player's special ability (if it is) will be blocked for one night. Thanks to this blocking, you can not only not let the mafioso to shoot, but also prevent the commissioner from checking on suspect. So before you sleep with someone - think :)
You are a fair, incorruptible judge. Only you can justify any player during the day (but not 2 times in a row and not justify yourself).
You are a strict accuser. Probably even fair accuser. At night, you can choose a player who will be executed the next day.
You have a unique ability â€” every night you can save the life of one of the players. Be careful, if you heal the mafia, the commissioner will not be able to kill him!
Your honesty is not questioned, so you can not be hanged in the day. You can choose who will be hanged in return. But, unfortunately, the bullets of the mafia do not care who you are...
You have an invaluable gift â€” a night immortality. Therefore, you will not be killed under the cover of darkness. But in the daytime players will be able to imprison you.

You are almost a commissioner. The main difference is that at first you shoot, then you think. Your shot is fatal, so it's better to think before you shoot. You can kill an innocent in blink of the eye :(

Unfortunately, your apartment burned down, and the state decided not to give you a new one. But the commissioner helped you find a roof over your head, and as a gratitude you work with him now, watching the residents.

You are the commissioner assistant. You know the statuses of the players he checks, but you can not influence his actions. In case of death of the commissioner, you take his place and start shooting back the mafia.
You are a master of inconspicuous observation. Every night you can check one player, but you do it unnoticed, including for yourself. Only the commissioner will see the result of the check.
You are a fan of sunbeams, so peaceful that no one dares to raise his hand on you at night and applies his action to himself.
You are a Rabble Rouser. Citizens can send victims to jail twice a day.

Pretense â€” this is your hobby. During the day you portray an innocent citizen, and at night, together with other mafiosi, shoot innocents one by one. If you find a commissioner â€” kill him, he is your most dangerous enemy!
You were an excellent mafioso, so the boss promoted you. Now you do not raid with a whole gang, but kill the victim yourself. Being a pro in the Mafia is so easy!
Your task is to protect the mafia. Every night you can find out the status of any resident. Find a commissioner and tell the mafia who he is!
On New Year's Eve you loved to blow firecrackers. Over time, this hobby turned into work.
Your vote have double weight on **evening** **positive** (yes) voting.

Pretense â€” this is your hobby. In the daytime you put on the mask of an innocent citizen, and at night, along with other yakuza, shoot innocents and mafia one at a time. If you find a commissioner â€” kill him, he is your most dangerous enemy!
At night, you can smash any player and force him to open his role (but not 2 times in a row). This player's special ability (if it is) will be blocked for one night. You, in turn, can not be blocked.
You are a horror, creeping on tiptoe of the night. Against you nothing can be done at night. And in the rest you are the same participant in the Japanese mafia, shoot innocents and mafia one by one.
You are so loyal to the yakuza that you are ready to sacrifice your life for its sake. Life is one, so once per game, of course.
"Make a salad" - every night your inner voice commands you and you listen to it. Mafia, civilians, commissar ... All of them are equal before the chainsaw and ax!
You swore allegiance to demons and can use their power! Curse any player and take to the otherworldly world anyone who touches him.

You can not calm down â€” social inequality does not give rest to your noble heart. All players with special abilities are your enemies. Destroy them every night one by one and do not touch citizens without abilities!
You are a master of keyboard and mouse. Hack into the computers of players and tell everyone their statuses.
You are a maniac chemist. Every day you can poison the water in the well of one of the citizens. Next day he will die.
Your status is {role}.
Your task is to save lives. You are the {role}.
Your status is {role}.
You can check one player. If he belongs to mafia, he will be killed. To check the player, type /check X, where X â€” number of the player.
Choose with the other Mafiosi (if any) the victim and kill her. To kill the player, type /kill X, where X â€” number of the player.
To sleep and check the player, type /sleep X, where X â€” number of the player.
Who will be healed tonight? (/heal X, where X â€” number of the player)
In case you will be tried to kill, you can choose a player who will be shot instead of you. To kill the player, type /kill X, where X â€” number of the player.
Who will be checked tonight? (/check X, where X â€” number of the player).
Who will be shot tonight? (/kill X, where X â€” number of the player). Just do not shoot at civilians, you play for them.
Who will be executed tomorrow? (/kill X, where X â€” number of the player).
Who will be checked tonight? (/check X, where X â€” number of the player).
Choose the victim and kill her. You are independent sniper and shoot with other mafiosi separately. To kill the player, type /kill X, where X â€” number of the player.
You can check a status of the player. To check the player's status, type /check X, where X â€” number of the player.
What will be exploded tonight? Type /destroy X, where X â€” a number from 0 to 2.
Where will you go tonight? Type /go X, where X â€” a number from 0 to 2.
Choose with the other Yakuza (if any) the victim and kill her. To kill the player, type /kill X, where X â€” number of the player.
To block the player, type /block X, where X â€” number of the player.
Choose with the other Yakuza (if any) the victim and kill her. To kill the player, type /kill X, where X â€” number of the player.
What will be exploded tomorrow (with you)? To kill the player, type /kill X, where X â€” number of the player. You can skip by /skip.
Who will turn into a salad tonight? :) To kill the player, type /kill X, where X â€” number of the player.
Who will be saved from injustice tonight? To kill the player, type /kill X, where X â€” number of the player.
Who will be cursed tonight? To curse the player, type /curse X, where X â€” number of the player.
Who will be hacked tonight? (/hack X, where X â€” number of the player).
Who will be killed (or protected) tonight? (/kill X, where X â€” number of the player).
In case you will be tried to imprison, you can choose a player to be imprisoned instead of you. To convict the player, type /imprison X, where X â€” number of the player.
You can justify one player. The main thing â€” do not justify the mafioso. To justify the player, type /justify X, where X â€” number of the player.
You can start second day voting. To do this, type /talk.
Who will be poisoned today? To kill the player, type /kill X, where X â€” number of the player.
ğŸ™ After the night, it is morning again, who would be found in the ditch?
ğŸ™ The night has passed, the morning has come clear, the soul is not well... The sun has risen above the horizon. But was it for all?
ğŸ™ The morning began with a shrill scream â€” someone found a dead man on his lawn or is it yelling therapy?
ğŸ™ The morning has come, joy and happiness in the house brought, but, unfortunately, not for all...
Citizens is discussing who will be imprisoned today.
Vote, do not miss your chance to imprison a mafioso! To vote, type /imprison X, where X â€” number of the player.
ğŸŒ‰ It's evening...
To imprison or justify {name}, that's the question! To vote, type /yes â€” imprison and /no â€” justify.
ğŸŒ› And again the darkness covers the streets of this sinful city...
ğŸŒ› It's Night...
ğŸŒ› Citizens in a panic runs through the city. After all, it's already dusk and it's not safe outside.
ğŸŒ› At night, everything is not as it is during the day... Lack of light makes people do strange things.
âš– The votes were divided, the people today did not imprison anyone :(
âš– Citizens once again had no time to imprison anyone, having missed their happiness.
ğŸ•› Citizens, apparently, did not get enough sleep at night and decided to sleep in the afternoon...
ğŸ•› Citizens once again had no time to imprison anyone, having missed their happiness.

ğŸ‘ˆğŸ» "Imprison {name}!" â€” this was the verdict of the most humane court in the world. After the {name} died, the citizens found out that {gender:he|she} was {role}.

ğŸ‘ˆğŸ» "Ah, young people..." â€” the voice of the Elder sounded clear discontent. Citizens acknowledged their mistake, instructed the elder to find the mafia and on his orders hung {name}, who turned out to be the {role}.
âš– Citizens wanted to imprison {name}, but {gender:he|she} was justified by the Judge.

âš– Mafia did not make a general decision and did not kill anyone.
ğŸŒ† Mafia discussed all the night, who will be robbed and killed. It was morning, but they did not decide anything and stayed at home...
ğŸŒ† Mafia almost came up with a plan that night! But suddenly the grandmother of the leader came and took him home by the ear.
ğŸŒ† Mafia in the car waited all night for the victim in the car, but she has never appeared...
ğŸŒ† There were no already familiar sirens and the rumbling of shots with the creak of brakes and the deafening ringing of broken glass, only deafening snoring came from the lair of the mafia!
